name: Amanda Heasley
text: I've been going to this Pizza Hut for years. They have rarely messed up an order, even when they are INCREDIBLY busy (which is the case quite often). The staff are very friendly and competent.

name: Mark Goho
text: Solid choice for pizza in Gates. We order almost exclusively online and get some good discounts. Orders are always ready very quickly and staff is friendly and attentive. My only complaint would be the fact that they charge for little dipping sauces. Kind of ticks me off.

name: Gary Stidham
text: Carol is great!!! She is so courteous and efficient. She suggests new things when you can't decide what you what. She is great.

name: Jeremy Lloyd
text: This particular location has the lunch buffet still and the staff is excellent! I wish I knew the waitresses name but she is just the best and we look forward to seeing her every time we go to the Gates location.

name: Nicole Pattison
text: I dont expect much from a casual pizza chain, but come on. You guys need to clean. No one else here, one table clean the rest still have cups etc. trash and crumbs on the floor. Tables, chairs and high chairs all sticky. Can only hope the kitchen is better kept. The dining area is terrible.

name: chris yandow
text: ordered a personal pan pizza supreme it was ready in 15 min just like they said. no complaints

name: Naomi White
text: Everytime I go inside they are rude and I feel like they're gonna spit on my food. No good vibes only when they deliver food.

name: Bill Lista
text: Very accommodating.  Thanks for the good service.

name: Roger Schlauch
text: If I could give this place a less than 1 star I'd give a negative number so low it's unimaginable. Most rude intolerant staff I've ever seen. DO NOT BRING KIDS HERE! Pizza took 45 minutes and the toppings were wrong at that. Completely …More

name: Kristina Bailey
text: If i could give no stars i would. I have horrible service. The place was disgusting. Garage all over the floor. The manger and the waiter were extremely rude. Will NEVER go back there again

name: Justin Feasel
text: To say this location is a trainreck would be an understatement. Had to go get my own plates for the breadsticks. Asked for silverware and napkins twice. Never got them. Waited 45 minutes for a medium cheese pizza.  Got a pepperoni pizza and walked out the door.

name: Ellen Every
text: Excellent place to eat and Carol is amazing  !

name: Julie Street
text: There is not one good thing to say about this Pizza Hut. I ordered a large pan pizza at 736 and was advised it would be ready at 806. The pizza maker never made the pizza until I asked at 815 how much longer for my pizza? They have 4-5 …More

name: Richard Kier
text: Love the new bacon and cheese stuffed crust. Yum yum

name: precious carter
text: They could have done a lot better with three shaping of the heart shaped pizza for valentine's day was super excited to come and get the $13.99 special with the cookie and heart shaped pizza and the shaping just was not right compared to pizza Hut ads all over Facebook about how it will look was disappointed in the outcome

name: Dominique Veronica
text: Always a fan. The staff is super nice.

name: Wendy Simbolini
text: I love the new choices they are now offering!

name: Brandon Appleberry
text: I've tried this pizza Hut 3 different times and it's was bad every time. The pizza was either dry or undercooked.

name: Alexis Fisher
text: carol is very nice and helpful

name: Kelvin Rose
text: I give them a 10

name: David Dearman
text: This site permanently closed just before Christmas 2017

name: Alisha Hayslip
text: Pizza hut has always been my favorite. Especially stuffed crust

name: Joe Crispino
text:
Waited an extra 25 mins over what was estimated.
Food was not hot meaning it was sitting done for a bit. …More

name: christian brown
text:
Place an order was not ready had to wait another half an hour .Manager was very unprofessional did not offer an explanation why they forgot about my order .
Place is dirty . never coming back again . pizza hut sucks .

name: Jack Bin Nubbin
text: pretty good pizza
